tool_input.commands:
LOAD "fixture.csv"
TALLY region -> total_amount=sum(amount), transaction_count=count(region)
RANK total_amount down
SHOW

error:
ERROR at line 3: RANK: invalid direction.

--- HINT from prior sessions ---
- MERGE joins external CSV: MERGE "filename.csv" on column_name — merges on matching column, quoted path required. KEEP filters aggregated results: KEEP column gt/lt/eq value — applied after TALLY. RANK orders results: RANK column asc/desc. PICK selects final columns: PICK col1, co
- RANK orders results: RANK column desc for descending order. PICK selects specific columns: PICK col1, col2, col3. SHOW displays final results
- RANK column references derived aliases created by TALLY, not source columns. After TALLY creates total_amount alias, use RANK total_amount DESC (not RANK amount DESC).

tool_input.commands:
LOAD "fixture.csv"
TALLY region -> total_amount=sum(amount), transaction_count=count(region)
RANK total_amount desc
SHOW
